system.description: When you enter a new settlement or community and look for old friends, contacts, or family members, roll +Sway.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You find someone you know, but they're in trouble, hold a grudge against you, or want something you can't easily give.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You find a friendly acquaintance who remembers you fondly. They can offer basic hospitality or information, but nothing more without repayment.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You find a good friend or trusted contact who's genuinely happy to see you. They'll offer shelter, aid, or useful information freely.
